name: Lark
long_description:
Lark builds AI agents to solve billing issues for subscription companies. Weâ€™re starting by automating billing support and chargebacks. Vijit and Jack previously built the usage-based billing product at Stripe. Lark is live with three customers: Midjourney, Julius AI, and Joon App.

Automating billing actions is nuanced and risky, which is why general support agents like Intercom Fin struggle with it. We have heard this repeatedly from customers. At Lark, we build agents with deep billing integrations that factor in customer usage data, prorations, credits, and more, with strong guardrails to ensure safe actions.

We want to be the AI layer on top of billing and are going after a $20B market opportunity in this space.
